msg: Renamed VectorHandler to ArrayHandler because most Java

author: dgraham
msg: Renamed CollectionHandler to ArrayListHandler for consistency with
other handler names.  Added a no-arg constructor so clients don't
have to specify a RowProcessor to use.

author: dgraham
msg: Added ability to configure the RowProcessor used in conversions.

author: dgraham
msg: Added constructors to allow configuration of the column number
or name to lookup instead of always returning the first column.
